page.title: 05Egton Show
page.content:
{ }**{EGTON SHOW}**
Last year between{13-14 Thousand people came from all over England, Scotland and Wales to take part in the show.
It was founded in{1876}and always takes place on the third Wednesday in August. It was started as a horse show since Egton was a Market Village. The show is run by the people of{Egton}who organise the refreshments and steward the classes for the animals.
I love going to the show and always look for the doctor's caravan because my father uses it as a base.This year (1985) the show is running a{"Warm - {Aid"}event, knitting vests for the Ethiopian children. By Jonathan Sowerby
